allow: Bash(npm install groq-sdk pdf-parse jszip zod zustand react-dropzone framer-motion lucide-react 2>&1)
Bash(npx shadcn@latest add button card input tabs textarea badge progress toast skeleton separator dialog label scroll-area select switch -y 2>&1)
Bash(npx shadcn@latest add button card input tabs textarea badge progress sonner skeleton separator dialog label scroll-area select switch -y 2>&1)
Bash(node -e "const p = require\('pdf-parse'\); console.log\(typeof p, Object.keys\(p\)\)" 2>&1)
Bash(node -e "const { PDFParse } = require\('pdf-parse'\); const p = new PDFParse\(\); console.log\(typeof p, typeof p.loadPDF\)" 2>&1)
Bash(npm uninstall pdf-parse && npm install pdf-parse@1.1.1 2>&1)

Bash(curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/generate-portfolio \\
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \\
  -d '{"theme":"minimal","data":{"name":"John Doe","title":"Software Engineer","email":"john@example.com","phone":"555-1234","location":"San Francisco, CA","website":"","linkedin":"","github":"github.com/johndoe","summary":"Experienced developer.","experience":[{"company":"Acme Corp","role":"Senior Developer","startDate":"2020","endDate":"Present","description":"Led a team of 5 engineers."}],"education":[{"institution":"MIT","degree":"BS","field":"Computer Science","startDate":"2014","endDate":"2018"}],"skills":["TypeScript","React","Node.js","Python"],"projects":[{"name":"Portfolio Builder","description":"A tool to build portfolios","url":"https://example.com","technologies":["Next.js","Tailwind"]}]}}' | head -c 500)
